job.title: Senior Data Scientist - Work From Home
job.description: stronguAbout LumenbrbrustrongLumen is guided by our belief that humanity is at its best when technology advances the way we live and work With 450000 route fiber miles serving customers in more than 60 countries we deliver the fastest most secure global platform for applications and data to help businesses government and communities deliver amazing experiences Learn more about Lumens network edge cloud security and communication and collaboration solutions and our purpose to further human progress through technology at newslumencom LinkedIn lumentechnologies Twitter lumentechco Facebook lumentechnologies Instagram lumentechnologies and YouTube lumentechnologiesbrbrstrongThe RolebrbrstrongWe are looking for an innovative highly motivated and proactive Sr Data Scientist to join our fast paced team The Sr Data Scientist is instrumental to the analytics team Working in a collaborative team environment creating data solutions you will buildscale validate and maintain complex data solutions and models from structured and unstructured data sources The Sr Data Scientist will also be involved with applications development and maintenance data cleansing and research metric creations and technical document creationsbrbrstronguRoles And ResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongstrongThe Main ResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliIdentify and source data needed to build analytic datasets in support of analysis and modeling activitiesliliWork directly with multiple levels of management and various teams to source data sets neededliliPerform ad hoc reporting and analyses projects as neededliliMaintain technical documentation of data sets and data dictionariesliliImplement ongoing improvements to data sets and modeling activitiesliliGuide and collaborate with data visualization developers to support data needs creatively to provide appropriate insights to the businessliliBuilding data repositories such as data warehouses data lakes and operational data stores etcbrliulstronguWhat We Look For In a CandidatebrustrongulliMasters degree or its equivalent in Management Information Systems Applied Statistics Applied Mathematics or related field of studyliliStrong understanding of analytic infrastructuresenvironmentslili3 years of data engineering experience  data acquisition cleansing mining exploratory analysis data modeling visualization advanced SQL and Big Data managementconceptsliliExperience with Oracle SQL Server SAP and PythonliliExperience managing ETL processes and gatewaysliliExperience presenting to small and large groups of people both technical experts and business executivesliliAbility to manage a portfolio of large analytics projects with multiple business stakeholders in a fastmoving matrixed setting with high level of professionalismliliA selfstarter who is able to work both independently and as part of a teamliliComfortable interacting professionally with a diverse group executives managers data analysts subject matter experts and end usersliliNice to have but not required experience building Power Bi models intermediate DAX and Power APPsliliAdvanced MS Access skillsliliComfortable reaching out to domain experts to seek the knowledge you needliliExperience in telecom industry a plusbrliulstronguWhat To Expect NextbrbrustrongRequisition  257592brbrustrongEEO StatementbrbrstronguWe are committed
